entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
